title: Seattle Park District Town Hall 8/15/22
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy
The Seattle Park District Board holds a Town Hall at Rainier Beach Community Center. This fall, the Seattle City Council, sitting as the Seattle Park District Board of Directors, will approve the Park District’s next cycle of investments. Approved by Seattle voters in 2014, the Park District levies investment to maintain, operate, and improve parks and related facilities. The Park District is funded by property taxing authority limited to 75 cents per-thousand dollars of assessed value.
